item.title: Wtf is with all of this batch
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Zach1188:

Batch is pure crap, why can’t people, at very least, put it in a C++ app using the system command. At least then the source is not readily available.

What are you afraid ‘pplz gonna leech ur compilar fer ur servar n clinet.java’? I’ll admit, if you’re going to script, use bash. At least it has some sort of logical and practical format.

item.title: Wtf is with all of this batch
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:14, topic:191316”][me=bootnecklad] smacks his palm against his face.[/me]

rem is a comment. it doesn’t get seen when you execute the batch file… like // in java it doesn’t get compiled.

@ECHO OFF REM This '@ECHO OFF' turns echo off so the command #s don't get echoed.
:START
CLS
TITLE Is pk4pk good at batch?
ECHO Is pk4pk good at batch?
PAUSE

CLS
TITLE Lets find out...
SET CUSTOM= 
SET /p CUSTOM=[Y/N]
if %CUSTOM%==y goto Yes
if %CUSTOM%==Y goto Yes
if %CUSTOM%==n goto No
if %CUSTOM%==N goto No
if %CUSTOM%==* goto Error

:Yes
CLS
TITLE Wrong!
ECHO Errr... I don't think so.
PAUSE
GOTO No

:No
CLS
TITLE You are correct!
ECHO pk4pk isn't very good at batch.
OAUSE
GOTO START

Someone do a java one of me I’m not good at java.[/quote]
Batch fails. Java/C++ = FTW

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf is with all of this batch
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[me=bootnecklad] smacks his palm against his face.[/me]

rem is a comment. it doesn’t get seen when you execute the batch file… like // in java it doesn’t get compiled.

@ECHO OFF REM This '@ECHO OFF' turns echo off so the command #s don't get echoed.
:START
CLS
TITLE Is pk4pk good at batch?
ECHO Is pk4pk good at batch?
PAUSE

CLS
TITLE Lets find out...
SET CUSTOM= 
SET /p CUSTOM=[Y/N]
if %CUSTOM%==y goto Yes
if %CUSTOM%==Y goto Yes
if %CUSTOM%==n goto No
if %CUSTOM%==N goto No
if %CUSTOM%==* goto Error

:Yes
CLS
TITLE Wrong!
ECHO Errr... I don't think so.
PAUSE
GOTO No

:No
CLS
TITLE You are correct!
ECHO pk4pk isn't very good at batch.
OAUSE
GOTO START

Someone do a java one of me I’m not good at java.

Read full topic

javac no recoknixed

oh well.[/quote]

Title OSHIAT

Pause
echo off

bootnecklad:

It’s also good for ‘pranks’/‘tricks’ when you can convert it into a .exe

That has got to be one of the most stupidest things I have heard.

IP-Drowner:

Batch is a quite simple language to learn. So it is good for beginners and thus allowing them to understand more complex methods of programming later in the future.

Batch is not really a language, more of a script.

item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

My god is it dirty… PLEASE add ‘@ECHO OFF’ and at least a pause before the end.

@ECHO OFF
REM Batch file received as a tremendous keylogger.
TITLE 0shiat
ECHO I didn't notice but, as always I stay the same.
Pause
END

pk4pk You have some weird techniques. I like it.
